kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: C:\Users\SauravSharma\PycharmProjects\RobotFrameworkPOM\geckodriver-14.log

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot in JPEG format and embeds it into the log file.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
